Item ID1639

The Emerald ring is made by using a gold bar on a furnace whilst having an emerald and ring mould in the inventory. Making it requires a Crafting level of 27, and gives 55 experience.

The ring has no stats but can be enchanted using Lvl-2 Enchant ( 27 ) to make a ring of dueling.

Emerald rings can be sold to Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim, starting at 892 coins each when none are in stock.
